name: Dominic Maker
description: '''Dominic Maker''' (born 12 September 1986) is an English record producer and songwriter from [[Chichester]]. He is one half of the duo [[Mount Kimbie]], and is known for his production work for artists such as [[James Blake (musician)|James Blake]], [[Slowthai]], [[Rosalía (singer)|Rosalía]] and [[Jay-Z]].
